channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Preview Julia Donaldson's joyful tale of love
item.description: Two devoted scarecrows plan the perfect wedding – until a rival threatens everything

item.title: Your first look at Guz Khan's new comedy, landing this Christmas
item.description: The Farooqi family have a chaotic Christmas in Lapland after a surprise bonus for Dad.

item.title: Deceiving women into sexual relations ‘part of work’ for spycops, inquiry told
item.description: Whistleblower says senior managers did not forbid intimate relationships and advised him to use condoms Senior managers running a covert unit permitte...

item.title: ‘A doll to me and a trumptet to Jimmie’: six-year-old girl’s letter to Santa in 1883
item.description: Janet’s wishlist that ran in Leeds Mercury and letter from a girl in Hampshire in 1898 unearthed in newspaper archives The toys on the Christmas wishl...

item.title: Hillsborough families ‘very, very angry’ that no officers will face punishment despite report’s findings – live
item.description: Condemnation of system that ‘allows officers to simply walk away, retiring without consequence’ Full report: 12 police officers would have faced gross...

item.title: Putin says Russia not seeking war but ‘if Europe wants to fight, we are ready’ – Europe live
item.description: Putin’s comments appeared aimed at driving a wedge between Washington and European capitals In parallel to Witkoff’s meeting in Moscow, we will also f...

item.title: MPs launch inquiry into Andrew’s lease arrangements at Royal Lodge – UK politics live
item.description: Justice secretary expected to pull back from plans to reserve jury trials from only the most serious cases The former deputy prime minister Angela Ray...

item.title: US Navy admiral ordered second deadly Venezuela boat strike, White House says
item.description: The strikes, authorised by Defence Secretary Pete Hegseth, have raised fresh legality questions - but the White House says laws have been followed.

item.title: Quarter of police forces lack basic policies on sexual offences, Sarah Everard inquiry finds
item.description: The report, four years after the 33-year-old's murder, says urgent action is needed to prevent violent, sexual attacks against women.

item.title: Hadjar promoted and British teenager Lindblad gets F1 drive
item.description: Red Bull will promote Isack Hadjar to their senior team and hand Briton Arvid Lindblad, 18, a debut Formula 1 season in 2026.
